name: Space Thingy (Sh0tybumbati)
description:
This is a little game I coded back in collage.
It's a procedural Galaga-like game.
Two-players, WSAD and arrow keys, second player is mapped to arrows, but in single player both work.

Nothing too fancy and the hit-boxes were a bit finicky but it is what it is.
*WARNING* When I made this i had no idea how to control volume levels. LOL
